review_data.title: einfaches mexikanisches Lokal
review_data.content: Das Lokal hat viele Sitzplätze, auch geeignet für grosse Gruppen. Service ist sympathisch, Essen schmecken gut, aber sie müssen unbedingt...More

review_data.title: Fits the bill for large standard mexican fare
review_data.content: By Khalid restaurant is also called Casa Alegria. The menu has all the standards of taco, enchilada, fajitas etc along with offering lots of other dishes.For each you can choose chicken, beef or vegetarian. A main course is huge and filling, tasty, though nothing particular...More

review_data.title: Good Food, Excellent Quantity
review_data.content: The food is good but what will surprise you is the quantity. If you order for one person, this is enough for 3 people. We were a group of 15 people and none of us could finish the food in its entirety - not even...More

review_data.title: Tasty & fast
review_data.content: Large & cosy restaurant in the middle of Glattbrugg/Opfikon. Great choice of Tacos, Quesadillas, Enchilada, Sabanas, Fajitas, etc. and nearly 100 options on the menu. Practical for business lunch : the staff and kitchen team are pretty fast and very friendly.
